mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "REVIEWS_COMMENT" (u_no, rv_no, rv_cmt, rv_cmt_regdate) VALUES (#{u_no}, #{rv_no}, #{rv_cmt}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT cmt.u_no as u_no, cmt.rv_no rv_no, cmt.rv_cmt_no as rv_cmt_no , cmt.rv_cmt as rv_cmt, to_char(cmt.rv_cmt_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as rv_cmt_regdate FROM (SELECT * FROM "REVIEWS_COMMENT" WHERE rv_no = #{rv_no}) as cmt ORDER BY cmt.rv_cmt_regdate
